    @allure.title("Create template bot")
    def test_create_template_bot(self, page: Page, create_session):
        login_page = LoginPage(page)
        bots_page = BotsPage(page)
        bot_wizard = BotWizard(page)
        bot_details_page = BotDetailsPage(page)
        bot_card = "Use template"
        bot_type = "template"
    
        with allure.step("Test preparation"):
            login_page.goto()
            create_session()
    
        with allure.step("Go to bots page"):
            bots_page.goto(endpoint=bots_page.slug)
    
        with allure.step("Open create bot wizard"):
            bots_page.click_create_new_bot_btn()
    
        with allure.step("Fill credentials step"):
            bot_wizard.insert_bot_name(self.template_bot_name)
            bot_wizard.select_exchange_coin(coin_num=1)
            bot_wizard.click_next_market_btn()
    
        with allure.step("Fill market step"):
            bot_wizard.select_exchange_market(checkbox_num=3)
            bot_wizard.click_next_trade_settings_btn()
    
        with allure.step("Fill bot configuration step"):
            bot_wizard.select_bot_type(bot_card=bot_card)
            assert "active" in bot_wizard.get_selected_bot_configuration_attr(bot_card)
            bot_wizard.select_bot_template(template_num=1)
            bot_wizard.click_finish_bot_creation_btn()
    
        with allure.step("Verify bot creation modal"):
